title._content: Image taken from page 214 of '[The voiage and travaile of Sir J. Maundevile, which treateth of the way to Hierusalem; and of marvayles of Inde, with other ilands and countryes. Now publish'd entire from an original MS. in the Cotton Library.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The voiage and travaile of Sir J. Maundevile, which treateth of the way to Hierusalem; and of marvayles of Inde, with other ilands and countryes. Now publish'd entire from an original MS. in the Cotton Library.]" Author: Mandeville, John - Sir Contributor: HALLIWELL, afterwards HALLIWELL-PHILLIPPS, James Orchard. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 790.g.17.", "British Library HMNTS G.15828." Page: 214 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1839 Publisher: E. Lumley Edition: [Another edition.] Reprinted from the edition of A.D. 1725 with an introduction, additional notes, and glossary, by J. O. Halliwell. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002363611 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
